channel.title: Capitol City Podcast
channel.description:
First Hour - Synz Mix
Break -Weekly Special Track -Party Promotions for the week -Special Announcements
Second Hour - Guest Mix
Finale-Different every 4 weeks: 1- Listener Request, What? 2- Track O'da Month 3- PSY-ence Track presented by Anya 4- Ambient/Chillout

item.title: Episode 6 with guest dj Ramiro
item.description:
Second Hour Guest Mix by Ramiro

Ramiro started listening to EDM at the age of 14 after first hearing the 1993 album United Stance of Techno. Since then, his love for electronic music has only grown. He started spinning records for the first time in 2000 and has been going strong ever since. He's dropped tracks in clubs up and down the DC metro area, including Edge, Shorty's, Nation (Buzz/Cubik), Paradox (Fever), Five, Avenue, Fur, Ibiza and Bridges, just to name a few. He has open for such notable international dj's Paul Oakenfold, Paul Van Dyke, Hybrid, Christopher Lawrence, and Monk. In addition to bars and nightclubs, you can just as easily catch him at random house parties and field events-- anywhere there is a need for quality sound and an energetic vibe.

This week's show:

First Hour Synz Mix
Silicone Soul - The Strip
Phil Kieran - I Can't Stop (Kieran's Dubbed Out Mix)
DJ Phono - Gone (David August Vocal)
Matthias Meyer & Christopher Groove - More or Less (Dub Version)
Matt John - The Bleep Factory
Pascal Feos & Frank Leicher - Japan
Simian Mobile Disco - Gizzard (Version 2)
Olivier Hunteman & Dubfire - Terra
DoP - Your Sex (Paul Ritch Remix)
16 Bit Lolitas & Glowfield - 6 O'Clock (DAVI Remix)

Locals-Only Production Special: Tzeech - Broken Chord

Second Hour Guest Mix from Ramiro

James Zabiela - Blame (Tom Budden's Alive remix)
Luigi Rocca & Pleasurekraft - Nostromo
Dj Tonio - Get the Funk (Oliver Giacomotto remix)
Wolfgang Gartner - Get It
Rene Amesz & Ruell - Sticky Fingers
Sinisa Tamamovic - The Main Decision
Patrick Wayne - Session 7 (Shift mix)
Locomatica - Gangland (Mike Spaccevento remix)
Luigi Rocca - Mantra (Christian Cambas remix)
Fibre Optic - Smoke Detector (Optical mix)
Tony Thomas - Beginnings (Gary Beck remix)
Nic Fanciulli & Gary Beck - Hear Me Out
Christian Cambas vs Phntm - Window Pain (Koen Groeneveld remix)
Umek and Phntm - Dead Space
Manuel De La Mare - Resistance
Mauro Picotto - Cold Blood (Carl Lekebusch remix 2)

Finale - Track O'da Month -- Beastie Boys - Make Some Noise (Cornelius Remix)
